ads.title: Support AcidHub Development!
ads.description: Help keep AcidHub updated and free by supporting the developer. Your donations help fund new features and bug fixes!

ads.title: Join Our Discord Server!
ads.description: Get the latest updates, report bugs, and chat with other AcidHub users in our official Discord community.

ads.title: Follow on Social Media
ads.description: Stay updated with the latest AcidHub news and updates by following us on our social media channels.
